lead_paragraph: Ameril Umbra Kato organized the Bangsamoro Islamic Freedom Fighters to battle for an independent Islamic state.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Philippines: Rebel Leader Is Dead

snippet: Ameril Umbra Kato organized the Bangsamoro Islamic Freedom Fighters to battle for an independent Islamic state.
abstract: Philippines' military reports Ameril Umbra Kato, leader of small splinter group of Muslim rebels, had died of natural causes.
